data: `minecraft:block_placer` sets the item as a Planter item component for blocks. Planter items are items that can be planted into another block.
`minecraft:block_placer` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Name: block
data.Description: Set the placement block name for the planter item.

data.Name: use_on
data.Description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.
